name: Static Storm
description:
Static Storm

Trijam 196 entry by Lapwell & saricden.

  • Jump by pressing UP arrow, or clicking / tapping the screen.
  • Should be mobile friendly (landscape orientation preferred).
  • Jump on / over the static blocks.
  • Landing on a static block will increase your score.
  • Crashing into a static block will cause you to take damage.
